text: hyeonse-ui saenghwal-eul biyuhayeo geu deul-ege malhala hasyeossgeoneul geugeosdo machi hananim-i haneullobuteo bileul naelini daejiui sigmuldeul-i heubsuhanachomog-eun sideul-eojyeo balam-i geugeos-eul nallyeo beolineun geosgwa heubsahageoneul sil lo hananim-eun modeun il-e jeonjijeonneung hasim-ila
